title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with bayoneted musket, bayonet in scabbard, and cap box] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with bayoneted musket, bayonet in scabbard, and cap box] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 11.8 x 9.9 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather scroll exterior floral motif. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. Daggers & swords--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.26954 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2102
